002.title: A Novel Psilocybin-Aspirin Conjugate: A Multifaceted Therapeutic Approach for Alzheimer’s Disease and Other Neuroinflammatory/Neurological Conditions
002.abstract: This paper explores the synthesis, neuropharmacological rationale, and therapeutic implications of a novel psilocybin-aspirin conjugate designed for neuroinflammation modulation in Alzheimer’s disease and related disorders.
